title: I want to revert these DNS settings. Help
body:
So 4 weeks ago, I configured my DNS settings doing this 

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues (**Go to Configure Your DNS**)

After that, I began disconnecting like crazy in some of my games.

I want to revert these settings. How do I do it?

replies.body: It's not really a revert, all it does is refresh network settings in case of routing adjustments.  You may want to go over each step of the guide to help rule out possibilities.  Is your net issue overall, or only with League?  What's happening exactly?
Well I usually have disconnection attacks. But for the past week, these have become intense. They're never this intense. My ping regularly hits 600-1000+

That sounds awful, I'm sorry.  :(  When you get a chance, run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) in some of your impacted games so we can see if you're getting any other issues like packet loss.

Let's also get an overview of how your network is routing exactly.  Download [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and run a traceroute to the EUW game server:  192.64.170.252.

Run it for about 5 minutes, remove the first two sets of IP's on that list, and let me know the results.
It's only with League. And it has become intense af
If you watch some my my replays for my last 2-3 games, you'll see I disconnect and reconnect without a stop.
I'm convinced after I did this, my internet became 10x worse than usual. Please send help and hugs.
